about_the_game:
This Demo is Chapter 1 of 5 of the Temple of the Gods game. You will get to start the Journey, with an introduction to the story and Explore the world of Temple of the Gods.

Step into the Depths of 1920s Mexico in the Temple of the Gods

“Can you survive the jungle, the jaguars, and the mysteries of an ancient Aztec civilization? Temple of the Gods is a first- and third-person action-adventure game that takes players into the untamed heart of 1920s Mexico. Step into the shoes of daring archaeologists Jon and Jess Luna as they search for the legendary Gold of the Gods, hidden deep within a volcanic temple. Explore vast jungles, rappel through dangerous caves, and confront otherworldly creatures in this thrilling quest for survival and discovery.”

Core Gameplay Features

What Makes Temple of the Gods Unique?

  • Immersive Open-World Exploration – Journey through a vast jungle and uncover an ancient temple filled with puzzles, hidden pathways, and dynamic challenges.

  • Thrilling Survival Mechanics – Outwit deadly jaguars, evade lethal traps, and master essential tools like torches, compasses, and weapons to stay alive.

  • Dual Perspectives – Seamlessly switch between first-person and third-person modes, allowing for immersive exploration or cinematic combat tailored to your play style.

  • Dynamic Traps & Environments – Powered by procedural generation, traps and weather dynamically react and shift, ensuring each play through is unpredictable and filled with new challenges.

  • Psychedelic Adventure – Experience mind-bending sequences inspired by Aztec mythology, where reality blurs with the mystical. A fusion of historical realism and surreal fantasy, set to a soundtrack that shifts between hypnotic calm and heart-pounding intensity.

  • Dynamic Choices & Consequences – Every decision shapes your journey and ending. Will you save your team or push forward to claim the ultimate prize? What will you sacrifice for glory—or survival?

  • Multilingual Support in Development – Plans are underway to bring Temple of the Gods to players worldwide, ensuring the adventure’s story is shared with everyone.

“Temple of the Gods combines the intensity of Indiana Jones with the surreal beauty of Alice in Wonderland, crafting an unforgettable journey into the unknown and beyond.”

The World and Story

Welcome to the Temple of the Gods

  • Setting: 1920s Mexico, a lush jungle teeming with life—and danger.

  • Plot: Married archaeologists Jon and Jess embark on a daring expedition to uncover a lost temple deep in the jungle. Following cryptic clues left behind by ancient civilizations, they seek a temple built for gods to live and worship in. On their boldest expedition yet: locating the fabled Temple of the Gods, said to hold unimaginable treasures and secrets.

“Navigate through deadly traps, fight off temple guards, and face an active volcano to uncover the truth behind ancient Aztec legends. But beware—the gods don't take kindly to intruders.”

Full Controller Support – Play your way with seamless controller integration, ensuring smooth and immersive gameplay on every platform.

content_descriptors.notes: The game shows a representation for the Aztec's, history and culture. As so their are themes of human sacrifices and killing. The player will also struggle to survive as the reach the end, they will die over and over

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1080ti - AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In 1920s Mexico, married archaeologists Jon and Jess embark on a daring expedition to uncover a lost temple deep in the jungle, built for gods to live and worship in. At the base of a towering volcano, where they rendezvous with a second team—unaware of the dangers lurking ahead.
